#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int t;scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--) {
        long long num,base;
        scanf("%lld%lld",&num,&base);
        if(base==1) {
            cout<<num<<endl;
            continue;
        }
        long long ans=0;
        while(num) {
            ans+=num%base;
            num/=base;
        }
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
